sentences.sContent: Consciousness of the poor, they want to cheat, so that should have looked at invigilator.
sentences.sContent_eng: Consciousness of the poor, they want to cheat, so that should have looked at invigilator.
sentences.sCn: 自觉性差的，就会想作弊，这样，应该要有监考人看着。

sentences.sContent: The invigilator can not give any explanation to the content of the exam questions unless it is printed illegibly .
sentences.sContent_eng: The invigilator can not give any explanation to the content of the exam questions unless it is printed illegibly .
sentences.sCn: 监考人员对试卷内容不作任何解释，考生对试题文字有不清之处，应给予答复。
